m_szDocTitle: Meet Clarity: Honda’s New Hydrogen Fuel Cell Car Launching For $500 a month
m_szDocSumamry: Meet Clarity: Honda’s New Hydrogen Fuel Cell Car Launching For $500 a month General 3 days ago by Ahmed Bilal Tweet   Electric cars get all the glamour and fame but they’re not the only innovative vehicles around. Honda is going to start selling its all new Hydrogen Fuel Cell sedan in the later part of this year. Honda’s latest version of the car called Clarity will be available in the markets no later than December 2016. We’re headed for a better future This version of the car by Honda was first seen at the Tokyo Auto Show last year, and appeared later in some other shows including the LA Aut
